reviewText: It's very nice that NJP's friends had so many nice things to say about him after his funeral, but as far as seeing what his work was like, you might just as well watch the minute-and-a-half video clip by the first reviewer. Essentially, the same collection of talking heads at what amounts to an art world soiree shown three times in versions of different lengths. One of the first rules of any video medium is "don't TELL me--SHOW me."
